Name: COMA: Lost in the Maze
About the game: COM: Lost in the Maze - is an atmospheric first-person game in the genre of maze, horror. It is designed for fans of quest, mind-twists and pure creativity. Find out the story of the main character and get out of the sinister nightmare. Features: - 5 levels; - Oppressive atmosphere; - 2 endings.
